# <a name="change-font-or-font-size-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-102">在 web 上的 Outlook 中更改字体或字号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-102">Change font or font size in Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-103">阅读电子邮件时, 可以使用浏览器的缩放功能放大或缩小屏幕上的文本。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-103">When reading email, you can use your browser's zoom function to make the text on your screen larger or smaller.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-104">撰写邮件时更改字体或字号:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-104">To change the font or font size while composing a message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-105">在撰写窗格的底部, 选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-105">At the bottom of the compose pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-106">**字体**或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-106">**Font** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-107">**字号**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-107">**Font size**.</span></span>
    
2. <span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-108">选择要使用的字体或字号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-108">Choose the font or font size you want to use.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-109">如果在撰写窗格的底部看不到 "格式选项" 菜单, 请选择</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-109">If you don't see the formatting options menu at the bottom of the compose pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-110">**格式设置选项**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-110">**Formatting options**.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="2ec1c-111">有关详细信息, 请参阅[在 web 上的 Outlook 中更改字体大小](https://support.office.com/article/43a2137f-8c3c-46df-af4a-73a12c9bb86e)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2ec1c-111">For more information, see [Change font size in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/43a2137f-8c3c-46df-af4a-73a12c9bb86e).</span></span>
